ingredients.content: ½ tsp salt, plus extra to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, plus extra to taste

preparations.content: Place onions and garlic clove in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add courgettes, water, vegetable stock cube, salt and pepper and cook <b>15 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add butter and cream cheese and blend <b>1 min/speed 4<b>-8, increasing speed gradually.<b> Adjust seasoning to taste and serve immediately.
